name: Spaceship Escape (MikkoK)
description:
In Spaceship Escape your goal is to escape your broken down spaceship that is about to explode, to do this you have to find all the batteries and take them to their correct places and make your way to the escape shuttle.

Keep in mind that this game was made in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam 37 originally I wanted to have more puzzles to solve in the game but I didn't have time to get them functioning.

The palette I was assigned on this jam can be found here.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to open doors and use the escape shuttle

Mouse Click to pick up and drop batteries
